name: Avolve
description:
Controls: W,A,S,D move. left click Shoot, hold left click Charge shot, Mouse Aim, shift Dash, R Reflector/Shield, right click Damage over time bullet.

Avolve is a top down shooter where the player is an alien which due to its unstable DNA is constantly evolving. This leads to the gameplay and music evolving as the player progresses by defending their egg from the military trying to destroy it. There are a few different types of enemies such as tank variants and soldiers that can be destroyed using abilities such as dashing, the reflector, double shot and more evolutions. We hope you'll give our game a try and enjoy ;) .

(Appologies, the first version we uploaded wasn't put in the files correct, so we had to re-upload it)
